process_details.description: The Manage Contractor Grievance and Appeal business process receives, tracks, and resolves contractor grievances and appeals. The process ensures that grievances and appeals are handled in accordance with state and federal regulations and contract terms.
results: Tracking information as needed for measuring performance and business activity monitoring.
process_steps: START: Receive contractor grievance or appeal.
Validate grievance or appeal meets filing requirements.
Assign grievance or appeal for review.
Make determination on grievance or appeal.
END: Close grievance or appeal case.
shared_data: Contractor data store including grievance and appeal history
process_details.constraints: Grievance and appeal process must comply with state and federal regulations and due process requirements.
failures: Grievance or appeal does not meet filing requirements.
Unable to resolve grievance or appeal.
performance_measures: Time to resolve grievance or appeal = ___ days; ___ weeks
